text.p: COAL - Leopold LD - 150,000 tonnes Port Hedland/Redcar plus Immingham 1-15/12 $7.60 fio 80,000 shinc/30,000 shinc Capeklav.
Ormond - 130,000 tonnes Abbot Point/Antwerp early Dec $10.35 fio 45,000 shinc/30,000 shinc Belships.
Huang Shan - 120,000 tonnes Roberts Bank plus Neptune Terminal/Kaohsiung 1-10/12 $6.50 fio 40,000 shex/28,000 shinc China Steel.
Anafi - 70,000 tonnes Richards Bay/Jorf Lasfar early Nov $6.90 fio scale load/12,000 shex Samsun (amended).
TBN 65,000 tonnes Maracaibo/Ijmuiden 31/10-14/11 approx. $8.00 fio 2,000 shinc/two days shinc Coe and Clerici.
Fixtures reported from New York on Monday.
ORE - Comanesti 150,000 long tons ore Ponta da Madeira/Rotterdam 28/10-5/11 $4.65 six days Rohstoffhandel.
Ocean Conqueror 130,000 long tons ore Puerto Bolivar/Rotterdam 10-25/11 $5.10 six days Ocean Bulk.
Hassbat Qatar 125,000 long tons ore Port Cartier/Rotterdam 15-30/11 $3.80 six days Rohstoffhandell.
